name: Mecco the Chameleon
description:
You are Mecco, a Chameleon that is learing how to mix colors. That's why you go into baths filled with paint and mix colors.

CONTROLS:

  • W or up arrow, to move up.
  • A or left arrow, to move left.
  • S or down arrow to move down.
  • D or right arrow to move right.
  • Or use a controller, with left stick you can move around.

Develepors personal best is 31, try to beat that! (It's a difficult game)

This project uses Mark Magic Toolbox.
